name: Ethan Halbert
text: They weren't wearing masks. The governor said masks are mandatory. Also, the guy at the front acted very unprofessional. When we asked him to see the manager, he pretended he couldn't hear us. It was very unsanitary. Will not be going back to this location.

name: LOST SOUND
text: some of the best pie and fastest delivery drivers in town. The nice young man mr. bosek delivered my pizza in record speed and greeted me with a smile. he quite honestly drives the nicest ford fusion in town!

name: Lolly Goose
text: I'm a Howie's fan, I've found my love in their garlic crust.. I've even been so crazy as to actually order it as x3 on both a pizza and the breadsticks. Anyhow, it's pretty good pizza. The cheese, whether or not it's not a blend, kind of ‚Ä¶More

text: Amazing pizza and breadsticks are the best. The upgrade to the cheese-baked bread is definitely worth it and if you are ordering the $10/$15 deals the food is more than enough for 3-4 people. ‚Ä¶More

text: Love it. Their pizza is always good and hot.

text: Pizza is always good when we've gotten it. Reasonably priced for what you get. Always are super friendly at this location to.

text: They are quick and i like everything but brownies. Pizza is good.

text: Not the best but definitely my "go to" spot for delivery. Thin crust is really good here.

name: The Subaru Guy
text: Really nice staff and friendly. The pizza was really good as well for not being gourmet lol. Was not over cooked or under cooked. A lot of time HH can have a cardboard taste like little ceasers but it did not. Pizza was done quick even at a busy hour so thumbs up!! Good job.

name: Stan Oleszkowicz
text: Always a good pizza. Join the email club for extra specials. Ready on time and always delicious. Our newer go to place.

name: James B
text:

name: Jeffery Main
text: i get pizza from howie's at least three times a week. this is the best location in my area by far. the staff is cool, the pizza is made/cooked well & ticket times are ultra fast. they have their stuff together.
